title: Brazil : number of Facebook users 2017 to 2023
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of users in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 7.
In general Number of users in millions has rose over the Year.
Number of users in millions is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2023.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest Number of users in millions, of value 91.5 was reached at Year 2023
The lowest Number of users in millions, of value 71.9 was reported at Year 2017
